title: Apple hit with antitrust lawsuit over locked-down Apple Watch heart rate sensor
content:
Reported by Reuters, Apple is facing an antitrust lawsuit from AliveCor yet again. The Silicon Valley company claims it is monopolizing the market in the US for heart rate monitoring apps. The company says Apple has “complete control” over the market for these health apps. 

more…

The post Apple hit with antitrust lawsuit over locked-down Apple Watch heart rate sensor appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is facing an antitrust lawsuit from AliveCor, claiming it is monopolizing the market in the US for heart rate monitoring apps.
